name: Spider's Thread
skill: Deals (921/1101) DMG to all enemies. Targets take (21%/25%) more DMG for a limited time.
ability: Moderate chance to inflict sleep on all ranged foes at the start of each wave.

additional_data.description: A merciful spirit given to taking pity on even the least deserving of souls. Her attention span is short, however, and she's been known to give short shrift to potential benefactors when not "in the mood". All things considered, you're far more likely to get an earful of abuse from her than an extra chance. But hey, such is life, right? That's what she says, at least.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ She was previously named Silken Thread.
◦ Due to an issue in the Hong Kong version, Spider's Thread's Ability was temporarily locked from 06/17/16 until the 06/29/16 patch update.

main: "Oh, go on then... But this is your last chance!"
skill: "Let us bring this to an end."
limit_break: "It would appear chance has come knocking."
